Subject: Migrating EPP appliance to a new build
Description: We are in plan to migrate existing production EPP appliance from old ubuntu 18.x to 22.x. we have configured the external client to server communication channel via netscaler. Needing to confirm the configuration need at the netscaler for this migration effort. Is there option to enhance some of the security at netscaler and/or client & server. Wanting to schedule a call with technical resources.
What_We_Know__c: Customer wanted to migrate the EPP Server to a newer VM
Next_Steps__c:
The database was migrated to the new EPP Server.
Everything seems fine and the customer requested to keep the ticket open for a few more days, to make sure that everything works as expected
Account_Name__c: Children's Medical Center of Dallas - Auditor
